title: (x) Slightly rounded sans from PC - Calibri {Adriano E}
content:
This should be mind boggling easy, but I just can’t put my finger on it. I’m a Mac user and this font is from a PC. Can anyone help please, to identify this font?

comments.content: Maybe Calibri bold, from microsoft Vista?

Yes, you’re right.  
I’ve looked up Calibri and I’ve found that it’s a proposed substitute for Ariel, or at least it’ll take over the old font as a desired choice by the masses.  
As yet, I can only find it in TTF format, but no doubt will find a postscript version as the most horrendous price somewhere!  
Thanks for your help.
